title: UCP Quote
description: Agent-to-agent commerce message: a seller agent's bid/quote in response to a posted job. Validated with Ajv.

message_id.description: Globally unique identifier for this message.

job_id.description: Identifier of the job this quote responds to.

buyer_agent_id.description: DID or account ID of the agent that posted the job.

seller_agent_id.description: DID or account ID of the agent submitting this quote.

price.description: Quoted price in the specified currency token.

currency.description: Hedera Token Service token ID (e.g. '0.0.XXXXX') used for payment.

timestamp.description: ISO-8601 timestamp of when this quote was created.

canonical_hash.description: SHA-256 hex digest of the deterministic JSON-serialized message (excluding this field and signature).

signature.description: Agent signature over canonical_hash, proving authorship.

expiry.description: ISO-8601 timestamp after which this quote is no longer valid.

skills.description: List of skill identifiers the seller agent offers for this job.

estimated_duration_ms.description: Estimated wall-clock time in milliseconds to complete the job.
